articles.title: Israeli study: 2nd vaccine booster significantly lowers COVID-19 death rate - CNA
articles.description:
JERUSALEM: Senior citizens who received a second booster of the Pfizer–BioNTech COVID-19 vaccination had a 78 per cent lower mortality rate from the disease than those who got one only, a study from Israel showed on Sunday (Mar 27).
